text: Geoffrey Bond Lewis (July 31, 1935 – April 7, 2015) was an American character actor.Geoffrey Lewis – Filmography New York Times Lewis was known for his movie roles alongside Robert Redford and Clint Eastwood. ==Personal life== Lewis was born in San Diego, California. He was married to Glenis Batley from 1973 until they divorced in 1975, Then he was married to Paula Hochhallter until his death in 2015. One of his daughters is actress-singer Juliette Lewis. ==Career== Lewis worked many times with actor-director Clint Eastwood in several movies. They were Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil, Pink Cadillac, Any Which Way You Can, Bronco Billy, Every Which Way but Loose, Thunderbolt and Lightfoot and High Plains Drifter.Geoffrey Lewis profile, New York Times; accessed April 8, 2015. He is also part of the musical story- telling group Celestial Navigations. ==Death== On April 7, 2015, Lewis died of natural causes in his Woodland Hills, Los Angeles, California home, aged 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Official Website for Celestial Navigations Category:1935 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Actors from San Diego Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors
